**ART**

**The Art Institute’s James Rondeau Draws Plans**

This month, Art Institute director James Rondeau “celebrates a decade at the helm of the city’s largest cultural institution,” [profiles the Sun-Times](https://chicago.suntimes.com/art/2026/01/29/art-institute-chicago-president-james-rondeau). Among the institution’s challenges are “a seven-percent post-pandemic attendance decline that stems in part from a drop in international traffic to the United States.” But Rondeau “is pushing ahead undeterred, with a billion-dollar endowment that’s increased seventy-percent during his tenure and about 1,000 art acquisitions each year… The number of local visitors? That’s up too, with much of the growth coming from neighborhoods that the museum historically underserved, Rondeau said. Although regular adult admiss
